Name: Ready? Set. Haiya!
About the game: Do you have what it takes to be the legendary kung-fu warrior? Originally designed as an alternate controller experience, we are adjusting the controls for the game so that traditional keyboard users can experience what it feels like to be a kung-fu master! Three unique playable characters The Uptown Red L The graceful GioGio The Initimidating BoBo Two playable levels/OSTs Rhythmic Intensity Tight Ship Each track is a 2-4 minute intense experience, so make sure to be warmed up before you try them out!
